00049   Contact::Contact( Simulation* theSimulation_in, double alpha_in )
00050   : theSimulation(theSimulation_in)
00051   , delta(alpha_in*2.5)

00057   void Contact::createPoints()
00058   {
00059     points = vtkPoints::New();
00060     std::ofstream outfile("boundary_nodes");
00061     theSimulation->baseSystem->writeBoundaryNodes( nodes );
00062     cout << "Contact Points: " << nodes.size() << endl;
00063     
00064     for(size_type i=0; i<nodes.size(); ++i){
00065       points->InsertPoint(i,
00066                           nodes[i]->getx(),
00067                           nodes[i]->gety(),
00068                           nodes[i]->getz()
00069                          );
00070       mapNodes[nodes[i]->getNumber()] = i;
00071       outfile << nodes[i]->getNumber() << "("
00072               << nodes[i]->getx() <<","
00073               << nodes[i]->gety() <<","
00074               << nodes[i]->getz() << ")" << endl;
00075 //      points->GetData()->Print( cout);
00076 //      boundary_first_number = points->GetData()->GetMaxId() + 1;
00077 //      cout << "BOUNDARY FIRST NUMBER = " << boundary_first_number << endl;
00078     }
00079   boundary_first_number = points->GetData()->GetMaxId() + 1;
00080   double bounds[6];
00081   points->GetBounds(bounds);
00082   points->InsertPoint(boundary_first_number,
00083                       bounds[0]-delta,
00084                       bounds[2]-delta,
00085                       bounds[4]
00086                      );
00087   points->InsertPoint(boundary_first_number+1,
00088                       bounds[1]+delta,
00089                       bounds[2]-delta,
00090                       bounds[4]
00091                      );
00092   points->InsertPoint(boundary_first_number+2,
00093                       bounds[1]+delta,
00094                       bounds[3]+delta,
00095                       bounds[4]
00096                      );
00097   points->InsertPoint(boundary_first_number+3,
00098                       bounds[0]-delta,
00099                       bounds[3]+delta,
00100                       bounds[4]
00101                      );
00102   
00103   cout << "BOUNDS = (" << bounds[0]
00104        << "," << bounds[1]
00105        << "," << bounds[2]
00106        << "," << bounds[3]
00107        << "," << bounds[4]
00108        << "," << bounds[5]
00109        << ")" << endl;
00110   }

00112   void Contact::updatePoints()
00113   {
00114 //    nodes.clear();
00115 //    theSimulation->baseSystem->writeBoundaryNodes( nodes );
00116 //    cout << "Contact Points: " << nodes.size() << endl;
00117     
00118     for(size_type i=0; i<nodes.size(); ++i){
00119       points->SetPoint(   i,
00120                           nodes[i]->getx(),
00121                           nodes[i]->gety(),
00122                           nodes[i]->getz()
00123                       );
00124     }
00125 //  boundary_first_number = points->GetData()->GetMaxId() + 1;
00126   double bounds[6];
00127   points->GetBounds(bounds);
00128   points->SetPoint(   boundary_first_number,
00129                       bounds[0]-delta,
00130                       bounds[2]-delta,
00131                       bounds[4]
00132                   );
00133   points->SetPoint(   boundary_first_number+1,
00134                       bounds[1]+delta,
00135                       bounds[2]-delta,
00136                       bounds[4]
00137                   );
00138   points->SetPoint(boundary_first_number+2,
00139                       bounds[1]+delta,
00140                       bounds[3]+delta,
00141                       bounds[4]
00142                   );
00143   points->SetPoint(  boundary_first_number+3,
00144                       bounds[0]-delta,
00145                       bounds[3]+delta,
00146                       bounds[4]
00147                   );
00148   
00149   cout << "BOUNDS = (" << bounds[0]
00150        << "," << bounds[1]
00151        << "," << bounds[2]
00152        << "," << bounds[3]
00153        << "," << bounds[4]
00154        << "," << bounds[5]
00155        << ")" << endl;

00158   void Contact::createPolys()
00159   {
00160     polys = vtkCellArray::New();
00161     theSimulation->baseSystem->writeBoundaryConnectivity( boundaries );
00162 
00163     //boundary:
00164     polys->InsertNextCell( 4 );
00165     polys->InsertCellPoint( boundary_first_number );
00166     polys->InsertCellPoint( boundary_first_number+1 );
00167     polys->InsertCellPoint( boundary_first_number+2 );
00168     polys->InsertCellPoint( boundary_first_number+3 );
00169 
00170     std::vector< std::vector< Node* > >::iterator it_boundaries;
00171     std::vector< Node* >::reverse_iterator it_nodes;
00172     std::vector< std::vector< Node* > >::iterator 
00173                                           it_boundaries_end = boundaries.end();
00174     std::vector< Node* >::reverse_iterator it_nodes_end;
00175     std::ofstream outfile("boundary");
00176     for( it_boundaries = boundaries.begin();
00177          it_boundaries!= it_boundaries_end;
00178          ++it_boundaries ){
00179       polys->InsertNextCell( it_boundaries->size() );
00180       it_nodes_end = it_boundaries->rend();
00181       for( it_nodes = it_boundaries->rbegin();
00182            it_nodes!= it_nodes_end;
00183            ++it_nodes
00184          ){
00185         polys->InsertCellPoint( mapNodes[(*it_nodes)->getNumber()] );
00186         outfile << (*it_nodes)->getNumber() << " "
00187                 << (*it_nodes)->getx() << " "
00188                 << (*it_nodes)->gety() << " "
00189                 << (*it_nodes)->getz() << endl;
00190       }
00191       outfile << endl;
00192     }
00193 
00194     polyData = vtkPolyData::New();
00195     polyData->SetPoints(points);
00196     polyData->SetPolys(polys);
00197 
00198     int mat=0;
00199     //Create lines in vector:
00200     for( it_boundaries = boundaries.begin();
00201          it_boundaries!= it_boundaries_end;
00202          ++it_boundaries ){
00203       polys->InsertNextCell( it_boundaries->size() );
00204       it_nodes_end = --it_boundaries->rend();
00205       for( it_nodes = it_boundaries->rbegin();
00206            it_nodes!= it_nodes_end;
00207            ++it_nodes
00208          ){
00209         bars.push_back( new CompBar(mat, *it_nodes, *(it_nodes+1) ) );
00210         bars.back()->actualizePoints( );
00211       }
00212       ++mat;
00213     }
00214     this->updateLines();
00215   }
00216 
00217   void Contact::updateLines()
00218   {
00219     std::vector<CompBar*>::iterator it_bars;
00220     for( it_bars = bars.begin();
00221          it_bars!= bars.end();
00222          ++it_bars ){
00223       (*it_bars)->actualizePoints( );
00224     }
00225   }

00227   void Contact::readDelaunay()
00228   {
00229     int j=0;
00230     int h;
00231     int npts=3;
00232     int *pts;
00233     vtkCellArray* oCellArray = vtkCellArray::New();
00234     cout << "BOUNDARY FIRST NODE: " << boundary_first_number << endl;
00235     
00236     vTriangles.clear();
00237     oCellArray = delnyData->GetPolys();
00238     for(int i=0; i<delnyData->GetNumberOfPolys(); ++i){
00239       h=oCellArray->GetNextCell(npts, pts);
00240       if(h==0)
00241         break;
00242       if(npts==3){
00243         if( pts[0] < nodes.size() && 
00244             pts[1] < nodes.size() &&
00245             pts[2] < nodes.size() ){
00246           vTriangles.push_back(pts[0]);
00247           vTriangles.push_back(pts[1]);
00248           vTriangles.push_back(pts[2]);
00249           cout << "Triangle " << h << " = ("
00250                << vTriangles[j] << ", "
00251                << vTriangles[j+1] << ", "
00252                << vTriangles[j+2] << ")" << endl;
00253           j+=3;
00254         }
00255       }
00256     }
00257   this->orderTriangleNodes();
00258   this->updateContactElements();
00259   }

00261   bool Contact::orderTriangleNodes()
00262   {
00263     size_type i;
00264     int j, k; //maybe j isn't necessary
00265     Node* first_node, * second_node, * third_node;
00266     std::vector< std::vector< Node* > >::iterator it_boundaries;
00267     std::vector< Node* >::iterator it_nodes;
00268     size_type number_of_triangles = vTriangles.size()/3;
00269 
00270     for(i=0;i<number_of_triangles;++i){
00271       cout << vTriangles[3*i] << "," << std::flush;
00272       cout << nodes[vTriangles[3*i]]->getNumber() << "; " << std::flush;
00273       cout << vTriangles[3*i+1] << "," << std::flush;
00274       cout << nodes[vTriangles[3*i+1]]->getNumber() << "; " << std::flush;
00275       cout << vTriangles[3*i+2] << "," << std::flush;
00276       cout << nodes[vTriangles[3*i+2]]->getNumber() << endl;
00277       first_node  = theSimulation->nodes[ nodes[vTriangles[3*i]]->getNumber() ];
00278       second_node = theSimulation->nodes[ nodes[vTriangles[3*i+1]]->getNumber() ];
00279       third_node  = theSimulation->nodes[ nodes[vTriangles[3*i+2]]->getNumber() ];
00280       for( it_boundaries = boundaries.begin();
00281            it_boundaries!= boundaries.end();
00282            ++it_boundaries ){
00283         it_nodes = find( it_boundaries->begin(), 
00284                          it_boundaries->end(),
00285                          first_node
00286                        );
00287         if( it_nodes != it_boundaries->end() ){ 
00288           j = it_boundaries - boundaries.begin(); // num. of body where the node is
00289           k = it_nodes - it_boundaries->begin(); // position in boundary
00290           break; //node found, stop searching
00291         }
00292       }
00293       it_nodes = find( it_boundaries->begin(), 
00294                        it_boundaries->end(),
00295                        second_node
00296                      );
00297       if( it_nodes != it_boundaries->end() ){
00298         if( it_nodes - it_boundaries->begin() < k ){
00299           vTriangles[3*i] = mapNodes[second_node->getNumber()];
00300           vTriangles[3*i+1] = mapNodes[first_node->getNumber()];
00301         }
00302         // else : triangle is ordered, nothing to do.
00303 //        // Now we look for three adjacent nodes in the boundary... TBD
00304         it_nodes = find( it_boundaries->begin(), 
00305                          it_boundaries->end(),
00306                          third_node
00307                        );
00308         // this can be done more efficiently, sure! posible bug:
00309 //        if( it_nodes != it_boundaries->end() ){ //if its found in the same boundary, closed to the other points...
00310 //          vTriangles[3*i] = -1;
00311 //          vTriangles[3*i+1] = -1;
00312 //          vTriangles[3*i+2] = -1;
00313 //        }
00314       }
00315       else{ //node2 not found in body of node1... searching for node3:
00316         it_nodes = find( it_boundaries->begin(), 
00317                          it_boundaries->end(),
00318                          third_node
00319                        );
00320         if( it_nodes != it_boundaries->end() ){
00321           if( it_nodes - it_boundaries->begin() < k ){
00322             vTriangles[3*i] = mapNodes[third_node->getNumber()];
00323             vTriangles[3*i+1] = mapNodes[first_node->getNumber()];
00324           }
00325           else{
00326             vTriangles[3*i] = mapNodes[first_node->getNumber()];
00327             vTriangles[3*i+1] = mapNodes[third_node->getNumber()];
00328           }
00329           vTriangles[3*i+2] = mapNodes[second_node->getNumber()];
00330         }
00331         else{ //node 2 & 3 are in the same body... searching:
00332           for( it_boundaries = boundaries.begin();
00333                it_boundaries!= boundaries.end();
00334                ++it_boundaries ){
00335             it_nodes = find( it_boundaries->begin(), 
00336                              it_boundaries->end(),
00337                              second_node
00338                            );
00339             if( it_nodes != it_boundaries->end() ){ 
00340               j = it_boundaries - boundaries.begin(); // num. of body where the node is
00341               k = it_nodes - it_boundaries->begin(); // position in boundary
00342               break; //node found, stop searching
00343             }
00344           }
00345           it_nodes = find( it_boundaries->begin(), 
00346                            it_boundaries->end(),
00347                            third_node
00348                          );
00349           if( it_nodes != it_boundaries->end() ){
00350             if( it_nodes - it_boundaries->begin() < k ){
00351               vTriangles[3*i] = mapNodes[third_node->getNumber()];
00352               vTriangles[3*i+1] = mapNodes[second_node->getNumber()];
00353             }
00354             else{
00355               vTriangles[3*i] = mapNodes[second_node->getNumber()];
00356               vTriangles[3*i+1] = mapNodes[third_node->getNumber()];
00357             }
00358           vTriangles[3*i+2] = mapNodes[first_node->getNumber()];
00359           }
00360         }
00361       }
00362     cout << "Triangle " << i << " = ("
00363          << vTriangles[3*i] << ", "
00364          << vTriangles[3*i+1] << ", "
00365          << vTriangles[3*i+2] << ")" << endl;        
00366     }
00367     return true;
00368   }

00370   void Contact::updateContactElements()
00371   {
00372     std::vector< Constraint* >::iterator it_constraints;
00373     std::map< std::string, Constraint* >::iterator it_to_constraint;
00374     std::vector< std::string > indexes;
00375     for(it_to_constraint = theSimulation->baseSystem->constraints.begin();
00376         it_to_constraint!= theSimulation->baseSystem->constraints.end();
00377         ++it_to_constraint
00378        ){
00379       // deleting the pointers from basesystem:
00380       it_constraints = find( constraints.begin(),
00381                              constraints.end(),
00382                              it_to_constraint->second );
00383       if( it_constraints != constraints.end() ){
00384         if( (static_cast<ConstraintContact*>(*it_constraints))->getGap() > 0 ){
00385           delete it_to_constraint->second;
00386           theSimulation->baseSystem->constraints.erase( it_to_constraint );
00387           constraints.erase( it_constraints );
00388         }
00389         else{
00390           indexes.push_back( it_to_constraint->first );
00391           theSimulation->baseSystem->constraints.erase( it_to_constraint );
00392         }
00393       }
00394       else
00395         cout << "ERROR IN CONTACT CONTAINERS!!!" << endl;
00396     }
00397     //renaming keys of contacts with negative gaps:
00398     int i; //index number
00399     std::vector< std::string >::iterator it_indexes;
00400     for(i=0; i<constraints.size(); ++i){
00401       theSimulation->baseSystem->constraints
00402         ["CONTACT.N"+i] = constraints[i];
00403       
00404     }
00405     //creating new contact elements
00406     size_type old_size = constraints.size();
00407     size_type number_of_triangles = vTriangles.size()/3;
00408     for(size_type j=0; j<number_of_triangles; ++j){
00409 //      if(vTriangles[3*j] >= 0){
00410         constraints.push_back( 
00411            new ConstraintContact( theSimulation->nodes[ nodes[vTriangles[3*j]]->getNumber() ]
00412                                   , theSimulation->nodes[ nodes[vTriangles[3*j+1]]->getNumber() ]
00413                                   , theSimulation->nodes[ nodes[vTriangles[3*j+2]]->getNumber() ]
00414                                   , Simulation::alpha
00415                                   , Simulation::constraintMethod
00416                                 )
00417                              );
00418         theSimulation->baseSystem->constraints
00419           ["CONTACT.N"+j+old_size] = constraints.back();
00420 //      }
00421     }
00422     
00423   }

00425   void Contact::createDelaunay()
00426   {
00427     delny = vtkDelaunay2D::New();
00428     delny->SetAlpha(alpha);
00429     delny->SetInput(polyData);
00430     delny->SetSource(polyData);
00431     delny->Update();
00432     delnyData = vtkPolyData::New();
00433     delnyData = delny->GetOutput();
00434 //    delnyData->Print(cout);
00435 //    vtkCellArray* cell_array = delnyData->GetPolys();
00436 //    cout << *cell_array << endl;
00437 //    cout << cell_array->GetData()->GetValue(1) << endl;
00438 //    vtkExtractEdges* extract = vtkExtractEdges::New();
00439 //    extract->SetInputConnection(delny->GetOutputPort());
00440 //    extract->Print(cout);
00441   }
00442 
00443   void Contact::updateDelaunay()
00444   {
00445     delny->Delete();
00446     delny = vtkDelaunay2D::New();
00447     delny->SetAlpha(alpha);
00448     delny->SetInput(polyData);
00449     delny->SetSource(polyData);
00450     delny->Update();
00451     delnyData = delny->GetOutput();
00452 
00453     this->readDelaunay();
00454     if(mapMesh) mapMesh->SetInputConnection(delny->GetOutputPort());
00455     if(extract) extract->SetInputConnection(delny->GetOutputPort());
00456 
00457   }

00460   void Contact::createDrawingObjects()
00461   {
00462     ren = vtkRenderer::New();
00463     renWin = vtkRenderWindow::New();
00464 //    iren = vtkRenderWindowInteractor::New();
00465 //    iren->SetRenderWindow(renWin);
00466     w2if = vtkWindowToImageFilter::New();
00467     psw = vtkJPEGWriter::New();
00468     renWin->AddRenderer(ren);
00469     w2if->SetInput(renWin);
00470     psw->SetInput(w2if->GetOutput());
00471 //    vtkRenderWindowInteractor* iren = vtkRenderWindowInteractor::New();
00472 //    iren->SetRenderWindow(renWin);
00473     std::vector<CompBar*>::iterator it_bars;
00474     for( it_bars = bars.begin();
00475          it_bars!= bars.end();
00476          ++it_bars ){
00477       (*it_bars)->addToRender( ren );
00478     }
00479     ren->SetBackground(0, 0, 0);
00480     renWin->SetSize(450, 300);
00481 //    renWin->MakeRenderWindowInteractor();
00482 
00483 //    iren->Initialize();
00484 //    iren->Start();
00485   }

00487   void Contact::createDrawingContactObjects()
00488   {
00489     this->readDelaunay();
00490 
00491     mapMesh = vtkPolyDataMapper::New();
00492     mapMesh->SetInputConnection(delny->GetOutputPort());
00493     meshActor = vtkActor::New();
00494     meshActor->SetMapper(mapMesh);
00495     
00496     extract = vtkExtractEdges::New();
00497     extract->SetInputConnection(delny->GetOutputPort());
00498     tubes = vtkTubeFilter::New();
00499     tubes->SetInputConnection(extract->GetOutputPort());
00500     tubes->SetRadius(0.5);
00501     tubes->SetNumberOfSides(6);
00502     mapEdges = vtkPolyDataMapper::New();
00503     mapEdges->SetInputConnection(tubes->GetOutputPort());
00504     edgeActor = vtkActor::New();
00505     edgeActor->SetMapper(mapEdges);
00506     edgeActor->GetProperty()->SetColor(1,0,0);
00507     edgeActor->GetProperty()->SetSpecularColor(1, 1, 1);
00508     edgeActor->GetProperty()->SetSpecular(0.3);
00509     edgeActor->GetProperty()->SetSpecularPower(20);
00510     edgeActor->GetProperty()->SetAmbient(0.2);
00511     edgeActor->GetProperty()->SetDiffuse(0.8);
00512 
00513     ren->AddActor(meshActor);
00514     ren->AddActor(edgeActor);
00515   }

00518   void Contact::drawObjects()
00519   {
00520     ren->ResetCamera();
00521 //    ren->GetActiveCamera()->Zoom(2.5);
00522 
00523 //    iren->Initialize();
00524     renWin->Render();
00525 //    iren->Start();
00526   
00527     // output image:
00528     w2if->Modified();
00529     std::ostringstream title;
00530     if (image_number <10 )
00531       title << "image00" << image_number << ".jpg" ;
00532     else if (image_number <100 )
00533       title << "image0" << image_number << ".jpg" ;
00534     else
00535       title << "image" << image_number << ".jpg" ;
00536     psw->SetFileName(title.str().c_str());
00537     psw->Write();
00538 
00539 //    psw->Delete();
00540     ++image_number;
00541 
00542 
00543   }
